Key.English: Rite in the Rain notebook. To take notes in.
Key.German: Rite in the Rain notizbuch. Um sich Notizen zu machen.
Key.Chinese: Rite in the Rain 筆記本。做筆記。
Key.Chinesesimp: Rite in the rain 笔记本。做笔记。
Key.Italian: Rite in the Rain taccuino. Per prendere appunti.
Key.Czech: Rite in the Rain notebook. Abych si dělal poznámky.
Key.Japanese: Rite in the Rain ノート。でメモを取る。
Key.Polish: Rite in the Rain zeszyt. Aby robić notatki.
Key.French: Rite in the Rain carnet. Pour prendre des notes.
Key.Portuguese: Rite in the Rain caderno. Para fazer anotações em.
Key.Spanish: Rite in the Rain computadora portátil. Para tomar notas en.
Key.Turkish: Rite in the Rain not defteri. Not almak için.
Key.Russian: Rite in the Rain hоутбук. Чтобы делать заметки.
Key.Korean: Rite in the Rain 공책. 메모를 하려면.

Key.Japanese: Rite in the Rain フィールドブック。でメモを取る。
